thumb.name: Cross Your Fingers
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJust for You.%3Cbr%3ECory%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWishing you%3Cbr%3Ea happy%3Cbr%3E(and shadowless)%3Cbr%3EGroundhog Day!

thumb.name: You Came to Mind
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECoverVerse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EHalloween makes me %3Cbr%3Ethink of pumpkins.%3Cbr%3EValentine's Day makes me%3Cbr%3Ethink of hearts.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EAnd April Fools' Day%3Cbr%3Emakes me think of you.%3Cbr%3E(Go figure.)%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: America Soars Proud
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;America soars proud. strong. and free%3Cbr%3Ethanks to those who unselfishly served her.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EOn Memorial Day%3Cbr%3Eand always.%3Cbr%3EStephanie.%3Cbr%3Eyour dad.%3Cbr%3Eand his service%3Cbr%3Eto our country.%3Cbr%3Eare remembered%3Cbr%3Ewith love. pride.%3Cbr%3Eand gratitude.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: No Place Like Home
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%26#147;America! America!%3Cbr%3EGod shed His grace%3Cbr%3Eon thee.%3Cbr%3EAnd crown thy good%3Cbr%3Ewith brotherhood%3Cbr%3EFrom sea%3Cbr%3Eto shining sea.%26#148;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThere%26#146;s no place%3Cbr%3Elike home!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy 4th of July.%3Cbr%3EMike!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Sparkling with Fun
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHope your 4th of July is%3Cbr%3Ejust like you. Bonnie...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBright and warm%3Cbr%3Eand sparkling with fun!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Warm Appreciation
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ECelebrating You.%3Cbr%3EMr. Connor.%3Cbr%3EDuring%3Cbr%3ENational Teacher Appreciation Week%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWith Warm Appreciation%3Cbr%3Efrom John and Stephanie Adams.%3Cbr%3EParents of Your Student.%3Cbr%3EJake Adams%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: You're Loved and Appreciated
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3EFor Mrs. Jenkins.%3Cbr%3Ea Very Special Nurse%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EBecause you always%3Cbr%3Efind the time for others.%3Cbr%3Efor the things that are%3Cbr%3Eso important to your patients%3Cbr%3Eand to your family...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3EIt's especially important%3Cbr%3Eon Nurses Day%3Cbr%3Eto let you know%3Cbr%3Ehow much you are loved%3Cbr%3Eand appreciated.%3Cbr%3Etoday and every day%3Cbr%3Eof the year.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Of Different Faiths
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJess.%3Cbr%3Ethough you and I believe%3Cbr%3Ein different faiths%3Cbr%3Eand different miracles.%3Cbr%3Eour hope at these%3Cbr%3EDecember holidays%3Cbr%3Eis the same...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EJoy in our lives.%3Cbr%3Elove in our hearts.%3Cbr%3Epeace in our world.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHave a Happy Hanukkah%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Beauty and Light
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EA Hanukkah Wish for You. Sarah%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMay this season%3Cbr%3Eof beauty and light%3Cbr%3Efill your heart and home%3Cbr%3Ewith happiness.%3Cbr%3E
